definitions.body: be deaf; chiefly poet. (NH Pi. make deaf; Aram. h.re4, h.ra3 be dumb, deaf; Ar. xarisa4 be dumb, speechless, cf. As. ḫarâšu, restrain, acc. to Dl:Pr 100; v. Lag:BN 120)—
be silent, alw. of God's keeping silence when men pray Ps 35:22, Ps 50:3, Ps 83:2, Ps 109:1; sq. [[אֶל־]] Ps 39:13.
be deaf, subj. ´[[י]], sq. [[מִמֶּנִּי]] Ps 28:1; subj. [[אָזְנַיִם]] Mic 7:16.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[חֶחֱרִשׁ]] Nu 30:15, Ge 34:5; [[יְחֶחֱרִישׁ]] consec. Nu 30:5, Nu 30:8; [[וְהֶחֱרִשׁ]] consec. Nu 30:12; [[הֶחֱרַ֫שְׁתִּי]] Es 7:4 + 2 t. etc.; Impf. [[יַחֲרִישׁ]] Nu 30:15 + 2 t. (incl. Zep 3:17 v. infr.); 2 ms. [[תַּחֲרִישׁ]] Hb Hab 1:13; juss. [[תַּחְרֵשׁ]] 1Sa 7:8; 2 mpl. [[תַּחֲרִישׁוּן]] Job 13:5; [[תַּחֲרִשׁוּן]] Ex 14:14, etc.; Imv. [[הַחֲרֵשׁ]] Ju Jdg 18:19 + 2 t.; [[הַחֲרִ֫ישִׁי]] 2Sa 13:20; [[הַחֲרִ֫ישׁוּ]] Job 13:13, Is 41:1; Inf. abs. [[הַחֲרֵשׁ]] Nu 30:15 + 2 t.; Pt. [[מַחֲרִישׁ]] Ge 24:21 + 2 t. (incl. 1Sa 10:27 v. infr.); [[מַחֲרִישִׁים]] 2Sa 19:11; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: almost alw. of men Ge 24:21, Ge 34:5, Ex 14:14 (all J), Ju Jdg 18:19, 2Sa 13:20, 2Sa 19:11, 2Ki 18:36 = Is 36:21, Je 4:19, Job 6:24, Job 13:5, Job 13:5, Job 13:19, Job 33:31, Job 33:33, Pr 11:12, Pr 17:28, Ps 32:3, Ne 5:8, Es 4:14; Es 4:14, Es 7:4; also [[וַיְהִי כְּמַחֲרִישׁ]] 1Sa 10:27 (but rd. rather [[ויהי כְּמֵחׂדֶשׁ]] and it came to pass after about a month, LXX Dr); [[יחרישׁ באהבתו]] Zep 3:17 (LXX SyrVer [[יְחַדֵּשׁ]] he will renew his love, v. esp. Buhl:ZAW v. 1885, 183); ´[[ח]] c. [[לְ]] pers. keep silence at one, i.e. fail to make objection at proper time Nu 30:5, Nu 30:8, Nu 30:12, Nu 30:15, Nu 30:15, Nu 30:15 (all P); [[אלי]] ´[[הח]] Is 41:1 pregn. = come silently unto me; sq. [[מִן]] pers. cease to speak with Je 38:27; be silent about, pass by in silence, sq. acc. [[בַּדָּיו]] ´[[אח]] Job 41:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: rarely of God, permitting evil in silence Hb Hab 1:13, Is 42:14, Ps 50:21.
once causat. make silent, c. acc. Job 11:3.
be deaf, shew deafness: [[אַל־]] [[תַּחֲרֵשׁ מִמֶּנּוּ מִזְּעׂק]] 1Sa 7:8 be not deaf (turning) from us, so as not to cry.
